pullrequest.title: Fix for properly including GDAL headers on non-ubuntu systems

content.raw:
I just tested on my mac, and it looks like it fixes the build error.

I just triggered a [jenkins job for this branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-external-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/14/), but I think it won't do much good since that build script doesn't install GDAL. @\_jrivero_
content.html:
I just tested on my mac, and it looks like it fixes the build error.

I just triggered a jenkins job for this branch, but I think it won't do much good since that build script doesn't install GDAL. @_jrivero_
